content:
/>
X.i.6.A.1.c
.
Form for Filing a Pre-Discharge Initial Claim
The prescribed form a service member must complete to file pre-discharge initial claims is
VA Form 21-526EZ, Application for Disability Compensation and Related Compensation Benefits
.
References
:  For more information on
form requirements for a complete claim received on or after March 24, 2015, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.A.1
, and
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.B
qualifying for claim processing under the BDD program, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.B.1.a
, and
claim types or attributes that are excluded from the BDD program, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.B.1.b
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section A - Introduction to Pre-Discharge Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section A
